entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Chevery
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 11:07 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -23.0°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Chevery 04:00 AM AST Saturday 04 February 2023
Temperature: -23.0°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -37
Dewpoint: -26.1°C
Wind: WSW 33 km/h gust 47 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Local blowing snow. Wind west 40 km/h gusting to 70. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 14 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 13.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then periods of light snow. Local blowing snow. Wind west 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 13. Wind chill minus 38 in the morning and minus 25 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: A few clouds. Low minus 23.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Clearing near midnight. Local blowing snow in the evening. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 23. Wind chill minus 25 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:45 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
